name: Cajun Fries
description: Gourmet fries made at home with a little Southern Louisiana inspired flair. Spicy & fragrant, cajun seasoning packs a punch – a little goes a long way! Pair with your fave dip. We love Creamy Ranch Dip or Garlic Aioli.

ingredients.name: unsalted frozen shoestring fries or sweet potato fries

preparation: Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Arrange fries on pan and sprinkle with 1 tbsp seasoning; toss to coat.
Cook fries according to package directions. Sprinkle cooked fries with remaining seasoning before serving.
tips: Got extra time? Make your own fries—try Rosemary Garlic Oven Fries but swap in Cheesy Fries Seasoning or Kickin’ Jalapeño Burger Seasoning.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp prepared Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning
summary: We love to make our taste buds dance with this Cajun Fries Seasoning. This blend of premium herbs and spices creates an earthy, piquant flavour that tastes great and packs a punch. It's perfect for anyone who wants to add excitement and heat to their favourite snack. Sprinkle as much or as little as you like over your spuds for a healthy alternative to restaurant fries with added seasonings.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!

products.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning
summary: Who can resist restaurant-style cheesy fries? They’re even better when we bake them at home. Made with aromatic garlic, real Parmesan, and premium quality spices, this versatile seasoning is low in sodium, and free from gluten, artificial flavours, colours, and preservatives. Simply sprinkle it on fries, popcorn, pasta, or veggies for a healthy, cheesy family favorite.
